resources.string: Today No Meeting Scheduled/May Completed Already

1. JDialer app is for joining conference call
		 from the android mobile.

 2. App can be installed from the android 
		Version 5.0(Lollipop).

 3. Android device calendar must sync with
		 outlook calendar to use JDialer app.

 4. After installing, open the app it will ask
		 for the calendar read permission please
		 allow the permission to read meetings.


5. If you denied the permission then please
		 reinstall and open the app and allow the
		 permission to read the meetings from
		 the calendar

 6. All these permissions are system level
		 security permission must be allowed only
		 once on the beginning of the particular
		 feature to use, it will not ask next time
		 until you reinstall the app.

 7. After giving permission app will read your
		 calendar and will list all your current day
		 meeting and we can see next day
		 meetings by selecting next day date.

 8. Each meeting details contains title, time,
		 date, online meeting dialer number and
		 the conference ID,leadership PIN if
		 meeting conatians leadership number.

 9. To join the meeting, dial the number by
		 clicking the dialer symbol green or blue
		 button of a particular meeting,app ask
		 for the permission to allow calls from
		 app, please allow the permission(system
		 level permission)dial the same meeting
		 button to join meeting after giving
		 permission.

 10. App is having option Exit to quite the
			 app in the right top menu icon.

 11. If time zone is changed from one time
			 zone to another by traveling or by
			 manually,app will convert the meeting
			 to respective time zone timings.and we
			 can reset(by closing the app from the
			 backend stack) the loaded data to new
			 time zone by using reset option.

 12. We can join as leader if the meeting
			 contains the Leadership PIN, the
			 dialer button will be in the blue color.

 13. For the same meeting you can join as
			 the participant by pressing NO when it
			 asks for the leadership PIN. and just
			 record your name and join the meeting.

 14. We have swipe to refresh for the current
			 day meeting, just swipe the view, app
			 will refresh and reload the current day
			 meetings.

1.We can join conference meeting
				 through phone.
 
		 2.We can join meetings as leader and
				 participant.
Is device time zone is changed...?\n\n Do you want to reset app data to changed time zone...?
